title: Connection problem
body: Right, so I am in a game on ranked, with Hi-speed Internet connection, but my ping is sitting at 400 or above, any suggestions?

replies.body:
Hey jasonlo95, 

I was experiencing this issue not to long ago and I used Riot's Connection KB and ti fixed the issue right up! If you haven't tried it before, I suggest you give it a whack :) 

Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

I'll be on for a bit so if you go through the steps and it doesn't work for you, feel free to reach out to me through here! 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}

Thanks for the help, unfortunately due to the lag last game, I was put in a LeaverBuster system, causing me to wait 20 mins before starting a queue, I don't know if anyone can lift it. But the problem seems to have solved.
Who is your Internet Service Provider (ISP)? Are you using a wired or wireless connection?

Wireless connection
Playing in Hong Kong, usually the ping is around 180 to 200, but I'm having a 400 to 800 ping right now.
